description:
The second match at the foot of Hakusan. Urara`s opponent is Halona, whose fighting spirit is ablaze. Halona aims to defeat Urara and prove that the Uniformers are right. Urara wants to win against Halona and become friends once again. The clash of their determination and emotions ensues.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 重なり合う音色[ユニゾン]
